official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to effective dates of disenrollments of medicare beneficiaries in health maintenance organizations and competitive medical plans.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act with respect to the effective dates of enrollments and disenrollments of Medicare beneficiaries in health maintenance organizations (HMO) and competitive medical plans (CMP). Provides that a disenrollment from an HMO or CMP shall be effective as of the 14th day after the request is made.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to effective dates of disenrollments of medicare beneficiaries in health maintenance organizations and competitive medical plans.
